subject: Re: [junit] Remote debugging a JUNIT test case
msgSnippet: Are you running your tests as java org.junit.JUnitCore MyTest Or using some other command line? (I m assuming JUnit 4 here) David Saff
messageBody:
Are you running your tests as

java org.junit.JUnitCore MyTest

Or using some other command line? (I'm assuming JUnit 4 here)

David Saff
